title: Caspar David and Co
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Italian, Western, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. In a central location, just across from the theatre, this restaurant offers choices for vegans such as a salad with oil/vinegar dressing, mushroom sauteed in olive oil with cashew nuts and almonds, and a penne arrabiata. Vegan dishes are not labeled on menu, so ask. Reservation for larger group accepted.
